topic.title: Noruka's Bar
topic.body: Decentrilized ZeroNet Forum-like zite. Noruka's bar is a place to take a drink, get to know people, and mainly to share knowladge. Cheers!

1538390706_18dhkzcDYd4zCD8Vtb47ULAciCuoy.body: OpenLoco v18.02 for windows is up in ZeroUp.

1538125286_18dhkzcDYd4zCD8Vtb47ULAciCuoy.body:
> [floppycasio](#comment_1_1EXZCkPCtDHABTMqza4cA43BD4caTEpoB): (Sits down on bar stool) I'll have one bottle of MooMoo Milk, please.

Fancy anything with that MooMoo Milk?
